DC CODE ยง 47-2853.27

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Any person who violates any provision of this subchapter shall, upon conviction, be subject to imprisonment not to exceed one year, a fine not to exceed $10,000, or both.
Any person who has been previously convicted under this subchapter shall, upon conviction, be subject to imprisonment not to exceed one year, a fine not to exceed $25,000, or both.

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Non-Health Related Occupations and Professions Licensure.
